content.content: 1. In subsection 3 (1) of the Act, “located in Ontario”, with respect to a person engaging in a transaction, as defined in subsection 3 (3) of the Act, with a consumer who is located in a jurisdiction other than Ontario, does not include a person who is also located in that jurisdiction, even if the transaction is facilitated by or through a location in Ontario. O. Reg. 55/14, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In subsection 3 (1) of the Act,

“located in Ontario”, with respect to a person engaging in a transaction, as defined in subsection 3 (3) of the Act, with a consumer who is located in a jurisdiction other than Ontario, does not include a person who is also located in that jurisdiction, even if the transaction is facilitated by or through a location in Ontario. O. Reg. 55/14, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 55/14, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 55/14, s. 2.
